examples.name: Connect to ROS-enabled Robot from Simulink
examples.thumbnailText: Connect to ROS-enabled Robot from Simulink
examples.summary:
Configure Simulink to connect to a separate robot simulator using ROS and then send velocity
            commands, and receive position information from a simulated robot.

examples.name: Generate Standalone ROS Node from Simulink
examples.thumbnailText: Generate Standalone ROS Node from Simulink
examples.summary: Generate and build a standalone ROS node from a Simulink model.
